title: Create a Multi-Container Pod
description: Create a Pod named ||multi-pod|| with two containers: ||main|| (||nginx:1.20-alpine||) and ||sidecar|| (||busybox:1.31.0|| running ||'sleep 3600'||) in the ||mercury|| namespace.

steps: 1. Create pod yaml with two containers:

validations.command: kubectl get pod multi-pod -n mercury -o jsonpath='{.status.phase}'
kubectl get pod multi-pod -n mercury -o jsonpath='{.spec.containers[*].name}' | wc -w
kubectl get pod multi-pod -n mercury -o jsonpath='{.spec.containers[0].image}'
validations.description: Main container should use nginx:1.20-alpine image

validations.command: kubectl get pod multi-pod -n mercury -o jsonpath='{.spec.containers[1].image}'
validations.description: Sidecar container should use busybox:1.31.0 image
